      • WILDCARD_ADDRESS

        private static final java.lang.String WILDCARD_ADDRESS
        The wildcard address to listen on all interfaces (either 0.0.0.0 or ::)

    • 构造器详细资料

        public NetUtils()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getHostnameFromFQDN

        public static java.lang.String getHostnameFromFQDN(java.lang.String fqdn)
        Turn a fully qualified domain name (fqdn) into a hostname. If the fqdn has multiple subparts (separated by a period '.'), it will take the first part. Otherwise it takes the entire fqdn.
        参数:
        fqdn - The fully qualified domain name.
        返回:
        The hostname.

      • getCorrectHostnamePort

        public static java.net.URL getCorrectHostnamePort(java.lang.String hostPort)
        Method to validate if the given String represents a hostname:port. Works also for ipv6. See: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2345063/java-common-way-to-validate-and-convert-hostport-to-inetsocketaddress
        返回:
        URL object for accessing host and Port

      • getAvailablePort

        public static int getAvailablePort()
        Find a non-occupied port.
        返回:
        A non-occupied port.

      • unresolvedHostToNormalizedString

        public static java.lang.String unresolvedHostToNormalizedString(java.lang.String host)
        Returns an address in a normalized format for Akka. When an IPv6 address is specified, it normalizes the IPv6 address to avoid complications with the exact URL match policy of Akka.
        参数:
        host - The hostname, IPv4 or IPv6 address
        返回:
        host which will be normalized if it is an IPv6 address

      • unresolvedHostAndPortToNormalizedString

        public static java.lang.String unresolvedHostAndPortToNormalizedString(java.lang.String host,
                                                                       int port)
        Returns a valid address for Akka. It returns a String of format 'host:port'. When an IPv6 address is specified, it normalizes the IPv6 address to avoid complications with the exact URL match policy of Akka.
        参数:
        host - The hostname, IPv4 or IPv6 address
        port - The port
        返回:
        host:port where host will be normalized if it is an IPv6 address

      • ipAddressToUrlString

        public static java.lang.String ipAddressToUrlString(java.net.InetAddress address)
        Encodes an IP address properly as a URL string. This method makes sure that IPv6 addresses have the proper formatting to be included in URLs.
        参数:
        address - The IP address to encode.
        返回:
        The proper URL string encoded IP address.

      • ipAddressAndPortToUrlString

        public static java.lang.String ipAddressAndPortToUrlString(java.net.InetAddress address,
                                                           int port)
        Encodes an IP address and port to be included in URL. in particular, this method makes sure that IPv6 addresses have the proper formatting to be included in URLs.
        参数:
        address - The address to be included in the URL.
        port - The port for the URL address.
        返回:
        The proper URL string encoded IP address and port.

      • socketAddressToUrlString

        public static java.lang.String socketAddressToUrlString(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
        Encodes an IP address and port to be included in URL. in particular, this method makes sure that IPv6 addresses have the proper formatting to be included in URLs.
        参数:
        address - The socket address with the IP address and port.
        返回:
        The proper URL string encoded IP address and port.

      • hostAndPortToUrlString

        public static java.lang.String hostAndPortToUrlString(java.lang.String host,
                                                      int port)
                                               throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Normalizes and encodes a hostname and port to be included in URL. In particular, this method makes sure that IPv6 address literals have the proper formatting to be included in URLs.
        参数:
        host - The address to be included in the URL.
        port - The port for the URL address.
        返回:
        The proper URL string encoded IP address and port.
        抛出:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown, if the hostname cannot be translated into a URL.

      • getIPv6UrlRepresentation

        private static java.lang.String getIPv6UrlRepresentation(java.net.Inet6Address address)
        Creates a compressed URL style representation of an Inet6Address.

        This method copies and adopts code from Google's Guava library. We re-implement this here in order to reduce dependency on Guava. The Guava library has frequently caused dependency conflicts in the past.

      • getIPv6UrlRepresentation

        private static java.lang.String getIPv6UrlRepresentation(byte[] addressBytes)
        Creates a compressed URL style representation of an Inet6Address.

        This method copies and adopts code from Google's Guava library. We re-implement this here in order to reduce dependency on Guava. The Guava library has frequently caused dependency conflicts in the past.

      • getPortRangeFromString

        public static java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> getPortRangeFromString(java.lang.String rangeDefinition)
                                                                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Returns an iterator over available ports defined by the range definition.
        参数:
        rangeDefinition - String describing a single port, a range of ports or multiple ranges.
        返回:
        Set of ports from the range definition
        抛出:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If an invalid string is passed.

      • createSocketFromPorts

        public static java.net.ServerSocket createSocketFromPorts(java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> portsIterator,
                                                          NetUtils.SocketFactory factory)
        Tries to allocate a socket from the given sets of ports.
        参数:
        portsIterator - A set of ports to choose from.
        factory - A factory for creating the SocketServer
        返回:
        null if no port was available or an allocated socket.

      • getWildcardIPAddress

        public static java.lang.String getWildcardIPAddress()
        Returns the wildcard address to listen on all interfaces.
        返回:
        Either 0.0.0.0 or :: depending on the IP setup.
